review: Works great. No issues at all
author: michelle goldberg

review: Did not realize until after I bought it that it could not get HBO go.
author: Michael

review: I love it just wish amazon prime gave you some new movies with paying for them.
author: CHRISTINE J. AZAR

review: Amazing product from Amazon. I had an Apple TV earlier for the sole purpose of AirPlay support. Was surprised that this device supports It with an external app called airbuddy. In addition has Amazon prime video and games that isn't found  in Apple TV. 5 stars for the snappy interface !
author: PP

review: nice product and easy to install
author: KCPone

review: Love the Amazon fire stick! We have a subscription to Netflix and finally feel like we are getting our money's worth! I would like to have one on every t.v. Can't beat it!
author: Tamala S. Looney

review: Amazon Fire stick has exceeded my expectations . Easy to install ( even for a 70 yr. old ) . Prime movie selection is good & I assume it will get better;  enjoy the fact that i can watch  tv shows like 'justified' etc. Looking forward to Amazon launching new tv shows.....
author: Richard Haiber

review: It was easy to set up and I'm using both Amazon prime and Netflix so far.
author: M van
